eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Indiana; AT 01:43 PM ON NOV 21, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:58 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Indiana EAS System. This test is conducted in coordination with the Indiana Broadcasters as a public service to the citizens of Indiana.
